svg.title: Testing that dynamic changes to the element for a given ID are reflected in textPath
svg.script: function startTest() { document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); // in case we're not gecko setTimeout(doTest, 5000); } function doTest() { // check that changing an id to "m1" lets l1 find it var x = document.getElementById("x"); x.setAttribute("id", "m1"); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
